tasks.task_description: Examine current typography styles and theme
Check homepage featured writing cards for unwanted shapes
Reorganize typography system based on Apple HIG
Fix any visual issues on featured writing cards

description: Audit and reorganize website typography based on Apple HIG
context: Examined current typography system in theme.css - found comprehensive Apple HIG-based typography with proper font stacks, optical sizing, letter spacing, and line heights. Checked homepage - featured writing cards use standard Card component with proper typography hierarchy.

Found potential sources of unwanted shapes: icon tiles have ::before pseudo-elements creating decorative elements, cards have ::before highlights, and various gradient backgrounds. The typography system is already comprehensive but may need refinement to remove decorative elements that don't align with Apple HIG principles.
